'''Petr 'peterix' Mrázek''' was a member of the ''[[Minecraft: Java Edition]]'' development team at [[Mojang Studios]], since June 2018.<ref name="peterix">{{tweet|peterixxx|996105344584765442|In June, I'll be joining @Mojang and working on the #Minecraft launcher and tooling. What does it mean for Minecraft? Hopefully a user-friendly and in every way better Minecraft launching experience for everyone :D And don't worry. MultiMC is here to stay!|May 14, 2018}}</ref> He was announced on May 14, 2018.<ref name="peterix" /> He was hired to work on the [[Minecraft Launcher]], especially on Linux. He is known as the main developer of [https://multimc.org/ MultiMC], a custom Java Edition launcher originally created by Forkk<ref>{{cite|url=https://forkk.net/|title=forkk.net}}</ref> which he continues to develop after joining Mojang.<ref name="peterix" />
